title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log into their account. They have tried resetting their password multiple times but still fail to access.

title: Payment Failed - Card Declined
description: Customer attempted to pay using Visa ending 1234, but the payment keeps failing despite sufficient balance.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: Customer cannot download their January invoice from the billing section. The download button is disabled.

title: Incorrect Billing Address
description: Customer’s billing address shows an old city. They updated it but still displays the previous address.

title: App Crash on Launch
description: Customer reports that the mobile app crashes immediately upon opening on Android 13.

title: Refund Not Processed
description: Customer requested a refund two weeks ago but has not yet received the amount.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Issue
description: Customer is not receiving 2FA codes on their registered phone number during login.

title: Unable to Update Profile Picture
description: Customer tries to upload a new profile picture but gets an 'Upload failed' error message.

title: Subscription Auto-Renewal
description: Customer wants to enable auto-renewal for their subscription but the toggle is disabled.

title: Missing Order Confirmation Email
description: Customer placed an order but didn’t receive any confirmation email even though payment succeeded.

title: Live Chat Not Responding
description: Customer tried to contact support through live chat but didn’t get any response after 10 minutes.

title: Email Notifications Delayed
description: Customer reports receiving email alerts with 3–4 hours delay, affecting their workflow.

title: Website Layout Broken on iPad
description: The site layout overlaps on iPad browsers in landscape mode, causing navigation issues.

title: Password Reset Link Expired
description: Customer tried to reset their password but link expired within minutes after receiving the email.

title: Invoice Shows Wrong Tax Amount
description: The invoice calculation includes incorrect tax percentage for EU customers.
